sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' export default function Navbar() { const [getCourse, setCourse] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:3001/GetCourses"). then((result) => { setCourse(result.data); }).catch((error) => console.log(error)) },[]) return ( <>
  • Home
  • Courses
      { getCourse && getCourse.map((value, key) => (
    • {value.cName}
      • ))}
  • About
  • Contact
) }
